summary: This bill, the "Judicial Understaffing Delays Getting Emergencies Solved Act of 2025" (JUDGES Act), aims to address judicial understaffing in the U.S. district courts. It authorizes the appointment of additional district judges across various districts in several phases between 2025 and 2035. The bill also includes provisions for a temporary judgeship, modifications to the organization of district courts in Texas and California, and reports from the Comptroller General on judicial caseloads and detention space. Furthermore, the bill mandates the public availability of the Judicial Conference's judgeship recommendations.
